titleStmt.title: The idea of practical physick in twelve books ... / written in Latin by John Johnston ... ; and Englished by Nich. Culpeper, Gent. ... and W.R.
Idea universal medicinae practicae libris XII absoluta. English

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Idea universal medicinae practicae libris XII absoluta.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.

(from t.p.) 1. The art to preserve health -- 2. The preternatural disorders of mans body, and their signs -- 3. Medicaments -- 4. The art of healing -- 5. The general cure of diseases -- 6. External diseases -- 7. Feavers -- 8. Head diseases -- 9. Middle-belly diseases -- 10. Lower-belly diseases -- 11. Venemous diseases -- 12. Childrens diseases.
